title: Handle a Delivery Refusal
description: A carrier reports that a customer has refused a delivery. The agent must determine the next steps.

tasks.description: Receive an alert from the carrier that a shipment has been refused, along with the reason ('Damaged Box').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the exception and the reason.

tasks.description: Contact the customer to confirm the refusal and understand the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent speaks with the customer and confirms they refused the shipment due to damage.

tasks.description: Provide disposition instructions to the carrier to return the shipment to the origin warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully instructs the carrier to initiate a return.

tasks.description: Create a new sales order to ship a replacement to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proactively resolves the customer's issue by shipping a new order.
